title: June 2017 tweets
html_content:
This article is still yet to be completed due to stress.

We get a lot of stressful torture in our lives that makes us crash into slumber. Given that inspiration is a big variable, and we may have been lacking of it, this article will be completed as soon as possible, at our own pace... HONEST!


See also: June 2017 Facebook posts

This page archives Chris's tweets from June 2017.

Contents

  • 1 Fidget cubes
  • 2 Emotional and sensitive
  • 3 Dream analysis
  • 4 Pride Month
  • 5 Ashleigh Ball's new album
  • 6 Pickles
  • 7 MLP quiz result
  • 8 Love your song
  • 9 Chris draws himself as a MLP character
  • 10 Complimenting Doopie on her cartoon avatar
  • 11 Trolls ruin Chris' nomination

Fidget cubes

1 June, 12:48 am

Chris
Fidget Cubes are good.

Emotional and sensitive

1 June, 12:50 am

DoopieDoOver
I can't be mad when people ask "Can you draw me?" because when I was younger I did the same thing to another artist. Some people just don't know better. Not everyone understands what it's like to draw for a living. Be patient with others.
Chris
I know, especially when something Downs you emotionally so much about the subject matter. Especially with us, the artists, we get very emotional and sensitive. But we own our craft, because they have full heart and soul from us.

Dream analysis

1 June, 10:48 pm

Tabitha St Germain
A few weeks ago when Stelli died I dreamed there was toon villain in the garden pulling up flowers putting them into $ bags and driving off. Got in truck with military guys and said 'follow her!' They said good luck, her dad is that priest. We don't believe in him but we have jobs And she carried away all the flowers and left it barren and everyone knew.
Chris
Huh. That sounds interesting.

I'm curious, to better visualize it, the "toon villain" was that priest's daughter, and you were in pursuit for the floral recovery. Did she get all of the flora in one go? It may sound silly asking about a dream, but this sounds like a fun mystery drama. Was he pretending to be a priest to make money selling the stolen flora to lovers, funerals and other events, as a "legitimate" florist? Ooh! What if the "Priest" performed the same funeral ceremonies the flora was sold to? And he might be a past murderer who killed the innocent(?) people he and his daughter sold the flora to that he performed the funeral for.

Pride Month

2 June, 12:15 am

Chris
It is Pride Month, 2017! Take each day to get to know someone in the SLGBTQ Communities

Ashleigh Ball's new album

2 June, 11:18 am

Chris
Loved her new EP! üíñ

Pickles

2 June, 12:09 pm

KisakaToriama
I love pickles ‚ô°
Chris
Good for you.

MLP quiz result

Chris shared the result of an MLP cutie mark quiz. Chris would later use this as the cutie mark of his ponysona.

2 June, 10:59 pm

Chris
I got: LOL sign over a heart with wings! What is your cutie mark? quiz
[Link to "What Is Your Cutie Mark? Quiz"]

Love your song

Chris tweeted to Ashleigh Ball's announcement on her album dropping.

2 June, 11:37 pm

Chris
I Love your singing, and "Gold in You" is awesome. My fave track is "Shining Colours". Love you too, @ash_leigh_ball.

Chris draws himself as a MLP character

Chris posted a drawing of his MLP persona, then replied to some fan questions.

3 June, 12:59 am

Chris
Pegasisters and Bronies, my pony self, Miss Night Star!

Fan 1
what do you use to make these?
Chris
Skill
Fan 2
Your sona on the top left looks like one of those pepe memes.
Chris
That was not intended.

Complimenting Doopie on her cartoon avatar

3 June, 1:26 am

DoopieDoOver
[She linked to a video ]
Chris
You were really cute in that video. BTW, Pinkie Pie always has a Party Cannon.¬†:)

Trolls ruin Chris' nomination

Chris' entry to the Best of C-VILLE 2017 nominations was hijacked by trolls, forcing Chris out the contest. Chris was not happy:

3 June, 2:11 pm

Chris
I did not make the finals. Thanks a lump for over-voting me out, you Trolling Stupids.
[Link to Best of C-VILLE 2017 contest]

Chris/MLP crossover page

3 June, 10:14 pm

Chris
Night Star breaking fourth walls with Pinkie Pie. @AndreaLibman

Linked to the same tweet, Danish artist Merryweather received a mouthful after assuming Chris' gender:

@Merryweatherey
Christian *
Chris
@Merryweatherey Christine
@Merryweatherey
But you're a man.
Chris
NO, I am a woman. Get used to it.
@Merryweatherey
You were born Ian Brandon Anderson. So why did you change it to Christine?
Chris
There was Never Ever anyone of that name. Wipe it away from your memory.
@Merryweatherey
You said yourself in a video "I am Ian Brandon Anderson!!!" Didn't you?
Chris
No.

Merryweather would later interview Chris as part of his Internet Dream Lounge series.

Sneak peeks

4 June, 4:28 pm

Chris
The Free Sneak Peeks are Over Now. The only way to see the pages of Book 11 before it is fully completed is to..
[Chris links to post on patreon]

Patrons only

4 June, 4:41 pm

Chris
Book 11, Page 61 Christine Chandler on Patreon
[Chris links to Sonichu 11 pages only accessible by patrons]

Night Star fanart

4 June, 4:59 pm

Chris
null - View on Imgur [Chris links to the image on imgur] via @@imgur

Sonichu Binder

5 June, 1:22 pm

Chris
**ANNOUNCEMENT**

Show of Interest if you'd like: Who would like to see my Big Ol' Sonichu Binder, divided into... [Chris links to a post on his Facebook about his binders]

5 June, 7:22 pm

Chris
That's a LOT of art for for the art books.

Further correspondence

5 June, 5:24 pm

@AndreaLibman
[Link to photograph of MLP doormat ]
Chris
That's cute. ¬†:)

Who's that Pok√©mon?

5 June, 11:57 pm

@senpaimisskitty
[She shares artwork of recolored Pok√©mon. Tagged is Planet Dolan member @Ladybot3]
Chris
I would have called her Ladybotty

Hair dyeing

6 June, 11:13 pm

Doopie
I attempted to dye my hair extensions to match my hair color and it dyed my hands better than the hair
Chris
That's why we wear plastic or rubber gloves when colouring our hair.

With your foot?

6 June, 11:18 pm

@blabberdookie
[Artist shares work and jokes that they drew it with their foot]
Chris
With your foot? That Is Amazing. ¬†:)

Blue hair and bigger breasts

7 June, 6:31 pm

Chris
Difference being blue hair and bigger breasts today from then. [Link to removed Facebook post]

CLog 06072017

Chris shared the same video twice in the space of ten minutes:

7 June, 6:39 pm

Chris
#PS4share
[Link to CLog 06072017]
Chris
CLog 06072017: http://youtu.be/J_IhTPNPCUY?a via @YouTube
[Link to CLog 06072017]

Live Drawing Stream 06072017

Chris shared his Live Drawing Stream:

7 June, 6:46 pm

Chris
Check out my broadcast from my PlayStation 4! #PS4live (THE PLAYROOM) live at
[Link to Stream]

Chris shared the Stream again hours later:

7 June, 9:13 pm

Chris
Live Drawing Stream - 06072017: http://youtu.be/nWhCMJJkahg?a via @YouTube
[Link to Stream]

Sonichu 13 reveal

7 June, 9:09 pm

Chris
#PDComics

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nWhCMJJkahg

Towards the end of June, Chris returned to the tweet to make people aware of an error:

27 June, 9:08 pm

Chris
By the way, Hellbent says, "I've heard y'all"; I just fixed that detail on the .jpg yesterday.

Sonichu fan art

Planet Dolan artist Salty Squid shared his fan art of Sonichu. Chris retweeted shortly after:

8 June, 2:25 pm

@SquidWasTaken
I made a quick sketch of @CWCSonichu's Sonichu, to show my appreciation of his PD crossover comics! Hope you like it Christine <3

Chris
Awesome. ¬†:)

Chris comments on shared art again

9 June, 4:58 pm

@WitchnessArt
[Artist shares work. Tagging Doopie, the artist calls her a "dingus"]
Chris
Yes she is. ¬†:)

Chris reveals a health concern

Twitter user @KisakaToriama held a game in which for every like she received, she would tweet a fact about herself. Little did she expect, Chris would participate with his own shocking facts:

9 June, 5:05 pm

@KisakaToriama
16. My nails are really brittle, so I don't paint them that often. With my job, it only takes a few days before the paint starts to crack¬†:(
Chris
Me too. Less lately, because I had a misformed fingernail for a while; it is growing back to normal, good shape.

Fast food delivery

9 June, 5:20 pm

Doopie
What a world we live in, where fast food can just be delivered to your house.
Chris
Blue Apron is good.

Chris shares his MLP crossover art

9 June, 7:57 pm

@AndreaLibman
Hope your #FluttershyFriday is going great!
Chris
Yes. Pinkie and I fourth-wall break to say hi; accidentally intrudes on Fluttershy's tea party.

[Chris attaches his MLP crossover art]

Chris' beauty is affirmed

9 June, 10:11 pm

@VimHomeless
Trans women are some of the most gorgeous women ever!
Chris
Am I one of them? üòú
@VimHomeless
Absolutely!
Chris
Thank you. üíñüå∏

Sentimental music

A Canadian radio station tweeted of an interview with MLP VA, Ashleigh Ball. Chris found an excuse to reply:

10 June, 12:39 pm

Chris
I loved the shoo-wop music style too. My father raised me on a lot of music growing up, including this genre among which. üíñüå∏

Pride art

Chris replied to a tweet featuring anthropomorphic art for Pride Month:

10 June, 5:13 pm

Chris
Ah, yes: straight, cisgender and Bisexual; cool. üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà

Adam West tributes

Chris replied to a tweet which concerned the death of Batman's Adam West. Chris also contributed his own tribute. Note his affinity for the iconic theme song:

10 June, 5:23 pm

Chris
@realhartman @tarastrong Oh, No! My mom enjoyed the Adam West Batman series while my brother, @colesmithey, was growing up under her watchful eye. "Na, Na, Na, Na, Na", Forever, original caped crusader.
Chris
Thank you, Adam West. Na, Na, Na, Na, Na Forever. üå∏üå∏üå∏üò≠

Chris
@colesmithey Yay our childhood Batman, Adam West, just died. I'd say honor him this week or so.

On trolling

10 June, 7:09 pm

@VimHomeless
Trolling is when stuff is done purposely. I see folks disregard political zealots as trolls, they aren't trolling, that's actually them.
Chris
What a valid viewpoint. üëç

On flowers

An MLP VA shared a photograph of a flower.

10 June, 11:09 pm

Chris
That is really pretty. üíñüå∏

Chris talks business

11 June, 9:08 am

Chris
I do apologize very much for not getting back to a Lot of my fans and inquiring business(?) proposals. More... http://fb.me/ZQ9le0Ck

Equality March

Tara Strong posted a tweet supporting the National Equality March. Chris contributed:

11 June, 9:11 am

Chris
Me too, and I pray that everyone in the marches all remain safe and unharmed; no unrequited riots need be, aside from the original intent.

Jumping to Doopie's aid

A user ranted about Doopie and Planet Dolan. They gave up when Chris joined in:

11 June, 8:29 pm

@Jaltoid
I can't believe it @DoopieDoOver killed Shima to steal her job. Thats fucking cold.
Chris
How dare you?! That is just mean of you to blame someone like that.

The user went on to protest. Chris continued to defend Doopie:

@Jaltoid
she also ruined planet doltan. fuck her
Chris
And, frankly, I like Doopie and her work and jokes on PD.
@Jaltoid
you're right. I was very foolish. I'm sorry for my mean words twords her.

"For me. Not for anyone else!"

11 June, 10:10 pm

Doopie
I'm going to work on becoming a better artist, for me. Not for anyone else!
Chris
Yes! üòäüíñüå∏üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà

Cleansing the soul

12 June, 12:47 pm

Doopie
I've been hella toxic lately. What are some tips for cleansing the soul and being more positive?
Chris
I'd suggest counting your blessings, counting things that make you feel happy, stepping back and taking deep breaths, listen to good music. And as for myself when I felt toxic that ended up cleansing my soul and keeping me feeling like smiling I looked deep into myself, taking my time, self-reflecting, and forgiving, supporting and loving myself.

Autistic perks

12 June, 3:50 pm

Chris
A Perk to having autism: you can easily overhear a distant conversation in a small building over music. ‚Äî feeling positive
